short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With two clicks, post the current link, with a comment to Blue Sky.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you are migrating to Blue Sky, or are a veteran, you may want to quickly share a link to the current article, youtube video, or github repository right from the browser. 

This extension is very simple in its goals. With two clicks, post the current link, with a comment to Blue Sky.
